scripts.prisma-generate: echo --Generate database client-- && rimraf prisma-generated && prisma generate && prisma db push
scripts.prisma-set-local: echo --Set local prisma-- && node prisma-switch.mjs local && pnpm prisma-generate || echo No prisma regeneration required
scripts.prisma-set-vercel: echo --Set vercel prisma-- && node prisma-switch.mjs vercel && pnpm prisma-generate || echo No prisma regeneration required
scripts.postinstall: echo --Generate prisma client and update database-- && pnpm run prisma-generate
scripts.build-dist: echo --Build with esbuild-- && esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --legal-comments=none --platform=node --target=node20 --outfile=dist/index.js && cp -Rvf prisma-generated dist/
scripts.build-dist-tsc: echo --Build dist folder-- && tsc -b --verbose && cp -Rvf prisma-generated dist/ && ncc build dist/src/index.js -o dist/bundle
scripts.build: echo --Build vercel server-- && pnpm prisma-set-vercel && pnpm build-dist
scripts.build-local: echo --Build local server-- && pnpm prisma-set-local && pnpm build-dist
scripts.build-OLD: echo --Build server via tsc-- && pnpm prisma-set-vercel && tsc -b --verbose && cp -Rvf prisma-generated dist/ && ncc build dist/index.js -o dist/bundle
scripts.dev: echo --Run tsx dev server-- && nodemon --watch src/**/*.ts --exec tsx index.js
